# McKie

 - What is McKie trying to explain? 

 - What is her theory? Summarize.

 - What are the key concepts in the theory? What assumptions does the theory make?

 - How was the theory developed?

 - How was the theory tested?

 - How good was the theory?

# Caraway

 - What cases did she compare? Why did she choose these cases? What other cases might have been chosen?

 - What comparative method did she use? Was this effective?

 - How could the study have been improved? What other methods could she have used?
